channel.title: Wordpress on Bluish capsule
channel.description: Recent content in Wordpress on Bluish capsule

item.title: Migrate Wordpress to Hugo
item.description: Jekyll Exporter (github page) is a plugin that will export everything from WordPress to Jekyll. There is also WordPress to Hugo Exporter but I choose the one for jekyll because the plugin is already available in the WordPress plugins. A good amount of work is still needed to fix the results so I didn’t bother. Change wordpress site URL The old site url is not available. I created a new CNAME in the DNS.
